title: Finding Peace in Chaos
verseText: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
insights: Peace comes not from the absence of trouble, but from the presence of God.

title: Walking in Faith
verseText: Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.
insights: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

title: The Power of Gratitude
verseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God's will for you in Christ Jesus.
insights: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.

title: Living with Purpose
verseText: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you.
insights: Your life has purpose. Your story is important. Your dreams count.
